items.description: List of ID of incoming edges.
items.title: in_edges

_88shortest_path_query.title: shortest_path_query

$eref.description: Represents a preset query. See the description below for details.
$eref.title: preset_query

items.description: ID of the source node that the edge connects.
items.title: source

items.description: ID of the target node that the edge connects.
items.title: target

___get_shortest_path.description: Calculates (from the precomputed data) a shortest path from query.source to query.target that matches the preset query. The query must be registered beforehand by using add_shortest_path_query. Returns a list of node IDs that represents a path from query.source to query.target.
___get_shortest_path.title: get_shortest_path

$eref.description: Represents a shortest path query information. See the description of get_shortest_path method for details.
$eref.title: shortest_path_query

___create_edge.description: Creates a link from e.source to e.target. Returns a edge ID as an unsigned long integer.
___create_edge.title: create_edge

items.description: ID of the source node that the edge connects.
items.title: source

items.description: ID of the target node that the edge connects.
items.title: target

___remove_node.description: Removes a node node_id from the graph.
___remove_node.title: remove_node

___get_edge.description: Gets the edge of an edge edge_id. node_id is an ID for the source node of the edge edge_id.
___get_edge.title: get_edge

items.description: ID of the source node that the edge connects.
items.title: source

items.description: ID of the target node that the edge connects.
items.title: target

___remove_edge.description: Removes an edge edge_id. node_id must be an ID for the source node of the edge edge_id.
___remove_edge.title: remove_edge

___create_node.description: Creates a node on the graph. Returns a node ID as string.
___create_node.title: create_node

___get_centrality.description: Calculates (gets the computed value) the centrality over the edges that match the preset query query. The query must be registered beforehand by using add_centrality_query.
___get_centrality.title: get_centrality

$eref.description: Represents a preset query. See the description below for details.

___update_edge.description: Updates an existing edge edge_id with information e. Property will be replaced.
___update_edge.title: update_edge

items.description: ID of the source node that the edge connects.

items.description: ID of the target node that the edge connects.
items.title: target

___update_index.description: Runs mix locally. Do not use in distributed mode.
___update_index.title: update_index

___update_node.description: Updates the property of the node node_id to property.
___update_node.title: update_node

___add_centrality_query.description: Adds a preset query query to the graph for centrality calculation.
___add_centrality_query.title: add_centrality_query
